content: I've added the coercion from SubgroupClass to Subgroup and the coresponding additive version. This may seem nonsense as we don't intend to use SubgroupClass this way, but I indeed need to take quotients between them so I need them as real subgroups, also for AddSubgroup, the further structures on it can stilll be added because the quotient relation are the same. See uses in #20913 in GradedPieces
